task_83.description: Move the green paper cup to the right side of the table, avoiding the red tissue
task_83.initial_setup: The green cup is upright on the far left corner, 25 cm from the edge. The red tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the center of the table. A blue plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the right side.
task_83.final_state: The green cup is placed 10 cm from the edge on the right side. The red tissue is moved to the far left corner.
